entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who said 'No, he's still stuck in the bog'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who was staring up at the statue and had to look more closely at what they were sitting on.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who whispered 'Muggles'.

entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge is mentioned as the one whose distinctive figure they were looking for.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are mentioned as being in their rightful place.

relationships.description: Ron is stuck in the bog.
Harry was looking at the statue.
Harry passed through the golden gates.
Hermione passed through the golden gates.
